Trump picks former Sen. Kelly Loeffler for small business administrator
item.description: Loeffler, who briefly served in the Senate representing Georgia, was among Trump's allies who also questioned his loss in the 2020 presidential electi...

item.title: Amazon rolls out Buy with AWS button to let software vendors more easily sell to its cloud customers
item.description: Amazon Web Services expects that a streamlined process for third-party software sales will bring more revenue for the cloud leader.

item.title: Jeff Bezos believes his space company Blue Origin will be bigger than $2 trillion Amazon
item.description: Jeff Bezos believes his space venture Blue Origin will one day be a bigger company than Amazon.

item.title: JetBlue cuts more unprofitable routes, tweaks Europe flights
item.description: JetBlue is in the middle of a new plan to return to consistent profitability and cut costs.
